name: MINDSCAPE (PoolGamesTM)
description:
MINDSCAPE/TALKMAN is a game where you go in the depths of the mind of talkman. Talkman is peace-full on the outside, but on the inside, bad feelings erupt on a daily basis. Try to keep his feelings up by not messing around in his mind!

Use WASD to move, and just touch stuff to interact. DO NOT MESS AROUND!
